mapper.insert: insert into ec_integral (cust_no, policy_no, integ_chg_typ, integ_chg_quota, integ_nam, integ_chg_time, product_nam, exp_time,remark, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{integChgTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{integChgQuota,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{integNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{integChgTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_integral set integ_chg_quota = #{integChgQuota,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, integ_nam = #{integNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, integ_chg_time = #{integChgTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, product_nam = #{productNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exp_time = #{expTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and policy_no = #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and integ_chg_typ = #{integChgTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cust_no, policy_no, integ_chg_typ, integ_chg_quota, integ_nam, integ_chg_time, product_nam, exp_time, remark, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_integral
select nvl(SUM(integ_chg_quota),0.00) from ec_integral where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rec_stat = '0'
